item.title: React-native-easy-loading
item.description:
# [react-native-easy-loading](https://github.com/yenole/react-native-easy-loading)
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/react-native-easy-loading.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/react-native-easy-loading)
适用iOS、Android
## 有问题反馈 在使用中有任何问题，欢迎反馈给我，也可以用以下联系方式跟我交流
* 邮件(Netxy#vip.qq.com, 把#换成@) * QQ: 850265689
## 添加到项目中
1. Run `npm install react-native-easy-loading --save` or `yarn add react-native-easy-loading` 2. `var { Loading, EasyLoading } = require('react-native-easy-loading');`
## 属性
- **`type`** _(String)_ - 用来区分不同Loading组件。
